text: 7. They're Present on Each Others'Social Media : Although these two lovebirds are notorious for keeping the details of their relationship private, they have graced each others'social media pages. The most recent post was a bittersweet photo telling the story of a fan who passed away after losing a battle to cancer. ` ` I had the pleasure of meeting an angel on earth! After my show in Miami, @ champagnepapi introduced me to Megan! She's inspired me so much with her strength and her perspective on life! So fearless and kind! It's heavy news that I can't slide in your DMs anymore like I used to!! There was always a smile waiting for me there! You brightened any day! Rest up baby girl! We will miss you!!''
